summary: fix the cmake 2.8.x detection of OpenSSL version broken in openssl 1.0.1m this is a follow up to security update for openssl: 1.0.1l -> 1.0.1m, references:  - http://public.kitware.com/Bug/bug_relationship_graph.php?bug_id=15386  - http://www.cmake.org/gitweb?p=cmake.git;a=commitdiff;h=c5d9a8283cfac15b4a5a07f18d5eb10c1f388505#patch1
